story.storykicker: The pre-marksheet 2016 of UPPSC UPPCS has been released by the Uttar Pradesh Public Service Commission (UPPSC) on the official website www.uppsc.up.nic.in. The pre-exam was held on March 20, 2016 for recruitment of 331 posts.
story.storybody:
The pre-marksheet 2016 of UPPSC UPPCS has been released by the Uttar Pradesh Public Service Commission (UPPSC) on its official website www.uppsc.up.nic.in. All those candidates who had appeared for the exam, may download the same using their registration number and other required details.

The pre-exam was held on March 20, 2016 for recruitment of 331 posts under combined state / upper subordinate services (Gen. Rectt.) and combined state/upper subordinate services (Special Rectt.).

Steps to download the marksheet

  • Log on to the official website, www.uppsc.up.nic.in
  • Click on the marksheet/result link
  • Enter your registration number, date of birth, gender and verification code
  • Click on 'see result'
  • Your result will be displayed on the screen
  • Download the same and take a print out for future reference

(Read: MAT September 2016: Important information at a glance)

This exam is divided into the following three stages:

Stage I- Preliminary examination

Stage II- Mains examination

Stage III- Interview

All those candidates, who have cleared this part of the examination, are now required to appear for the UPPCS mains exam. They will be required to fill another application form for appearing in the next stage of the exam. The candidates, who will qualify in the mains examination, would be called for the final interview round.

Read: LSAT India 2016: Results declared on June 1 @ www.pearsonvueindia.com

For information on more upcoming exams and results, click here.
